str2: Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From speiro; something sown, i.e. Seed; by implication, offspring; specially, a remnant.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
